pr_title: SAK-43678 Assignments: Incorrect order in name column when downloading spreadsheet [XLSX]

timeline.message: SAK-43678 Assignments: Incorrect order in name column when downloading spreadsheet [XLSX]

timeline.bodyText:
Can produce an NPE either use a lambda to filter nulls or the NullSafeComparator i.e.
return new NullSafeComparator<>(collator, false).compare(s1.getSortName(), s2.getSortName()
timeline.author: ern
